climbs.name: Pay to Play
climbs.fa: Elijah S, Chris H, Cameron J

content.description:
P1: A well protected roof followed by some spectacular vertical jug hauling. The second half is run out 5.6 climbing (optional .75 placement before the anchors). 10a

P2: Easy scramble to the top of a boulder up and left of the belay. A few thin, slabby moves (crux) lead to a mantel over a roof and more run out 5.6 climbing to the anchor. 10c
content.protection: Bolts, bolted anchors with quick links
content.location: Middle of the crag. Obvious featured vertical face.

climbs.name: Gag Reflex
climbs.fa: Cam J, Chris H, Elijah S

content.description:
P1: Climb the lie back / hand jam crack starting just to the right on Pay to Play. Pull through a crux and then finish on run out 5.6 jug hauling (the "R" section) to the anchor (shared with Pay to Play). 10a

P1: Head right off the belay up a right facing dihedral. After 20 ft, cut right following a diagonal dihedral to a leftward facing dihedral finger crack. Continue to the top. 5.9

Once on top walk off, head left to find the rappel anchors for Pay to Play, or head right and down a gully and an exposed traverse back to the P1 anchors
content.protection: Standard rack, including small stuff for P2
content.location: Just to the right of Pay to Play.

climbs.name: Corn Flakes
climbs.fa: Cam J, Chris H, Elijah S

content.description: Climb left underneath the big flake before pulling on top of it to an easy traverse right. Follow the obvious seem out right (crux) which includes a few big moves between good holds. Build a belay in the blocks at the end of the seam (takes BD 1-3). Walk off or scramble down the adjacent gully.
content.protection: Standard rack, including a small piece or two for the crux. Doubles .75 - 2 (keep some for belay).
content.location: Climb the first pitch of either Pay to Play or Gag Reflex. From the anchor, scramble directly right (exposed) to the start of an obvious left trending roof.
